## I18nCliTemplatePlugin

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/i18n/src/cli.ts" sourceLine="16" packageName="@commandkit/i18n" />

Compiler plugin for the CommandKit CLI to create locale files.
This plugin allows users to create locale files for commands in the CLI.
It registers a template named "locale" that can be used to generate locale files.



*Example*

```sh
commandkit create locale <locale> <commandName>
```

```ts title="Signature"
class I18nCliTemplatePlugin extends CompilerPlugin {
    public readonly name = 'I18nCliTemplatePlugin';
    activate(ctx: CompilerPluginRuntime) => Promise<void>;
    deactivate(ctx: CompilerPluginRuntime) => Promise<void>;
}
```
* Extends: <code><a href='/docs/api-reference/commandkit/classes/compiler-plugin#compilerplugin'>CompilerPlugin</a></code>
